ygData.subject: RE: LJ and the quest for crook staff
ygData.msgSnippet: The crook is dropped from the Great Wyrm Lord himself.  The Hierophant s Crook was gained in Fennin Ro s near weekly Nagafen killing event
ygData.messageBody:
The crook is dropped from the Great Wyrm Lord himself. The Hierophant's
Crook was gained in Fennin Ro's near weekly Nagafen killing "event"

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mikaela [SMTP:mikaela@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 8:08 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] LJ and the quest for crook staff
>
> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
> This druid only crook (Hierophant's Crook) is awesome. Can anyone
> tell us
> which NPC in SolB carries it? And what level they are, and anything
> else
> helpful to attaining it.
>
>
